title: REI Memorial Day Sale 2021 – The Best Deals for Cyclists
content:
REI’s Anniversary sale is their biggest sale of the year, and as usual it’s full of bargains on cycling gear, clothing, packs, and more. There’s also a ton of great deals on camping and bikepacking equipment. No matter what rides or adventures you’re planning this summer, now’s the time to take advantage of the opportunity to save up to 30% (or more!) on all the gear you need.

Bike Tools & Kits

• We like that  the fabric 11-in-1 Bike Multi-Tool uses color-coded tool bits, and even though it’s compact, the bits are long enough to reach those tight spots, too. Now just $22 (27% off).

• Perhaps one of the most clever ratching tools on the market, the fabric Chamber Ratchet Head Multi-Tool hides all of the bits inside it’s body, which then doubles as a handle for more leverage. Simply slide the bit to the other side to reverse the ratchet. On sale for $40 (25% off).

• If you only have one pump for every bike, the fabric Accubar MTB Tire Pressure Gauge lets you add a finer gauge for lower pressure applications like cyclocross, gravel, and mountain bikes without having to buy a whole new pump. Now just $40 (25% off).

• Also available in Black and White, the fabric Silicone Handlebar Tape is on sale for $30 (25% off) and offers a soft, grippy way to freshen up your bike for new adventures.

Car Camping & Bikepacking

• The NEMO Hornet Elite was voted Best Ultralight Backpacking Tent of 2021 by GearJunkie, making it an ideal choice for bikepacking. The two-person version weighs in at just over 2lbs, and the solo version at a mere 1lb 14oz. Reviewers loved that it was easy to carry, set up, and pack away. Originally priced at $450, snag it at $338 (25% off) through Memorial Day.

• There are camp tables, and then there’s the ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table. Its lightweight, durable aluminum frame is oversized, giving you room for all the food, snacks, drinks, and still leaving a little space to actually eat on. On sale for $97 (25% off).

• ENO JungleNest Hammock lightweight and packs small enough to bring bikepacking. It’s also breathable, and at 10ft long you can stretch out and get comfy. The attached netting will keep the pests away while you relax, too. Get it for $82 (25% off). Need to shed a few more grams? Upgrade the straps with ENO’s Helios Ultralight Hammock Suspension System. They’re rated to 300lbs and measure just over 8ft, but save a few ounces in your load out. On sale now for $26 (25% off).

• The BioLite FirePit+ is compatible with wood or charcoal, and has 51 air jets that minimize smoke. Use the USB-chargable battery bank to power up your devices while basking in its glow, or use the app to control the powered fan to adjust heat and flame output for customized warmth! Small enough to take car camping, it’s also a perfect home fire pit…and it’s a steal at $187 (25% off).

• Highly regarded as the Best Overall Backpacking Chair of 2021, the REI Co-op Flexlite Camp Chair is lightweight and easy to set up and break down. Now on sale for $42 (30% off).

• If you like a bigger seat and want to be the envy of the camp, bring the NEMO Stargaze Recliner Luxury Chair. It’s like a rocking chair with the smooth swing of a hammock for the ultimate lounge chair, and it packs down easily. This is absolutely our favorite camp chair, and it’s rarely on sale…grab one now for $165 (25% off).

• The Osprey 1.5L reservoir is easy to fill, won’t drip, and boasts twin-welded diagonal baffles that stabilize the water and keep it flat in your pack. Originally $32, get it for just $24 (25% off). Larger sizes also available if you’re a thirsty boi!

• The Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth Vacuum Water Bottle with Flex Straw Lid keeps your water cold all day long, but it’s secret feature is the Flex Straw Lid…so you can keep your eyes on the prize without having to tilt this 32oz jug up to drink from it! Fill up now for just $37 (25% off).

• The CamelBak M.U.L.E. 9L Hydration Pack is an update on a classic. It boasts 9L of gear storage as well as 3L of water capacity to keep you going all day long. Get it now for $86 (25% off)

• The CamelBak Helena 20 Hydration Pack has a specially designed torso fit with woman-specific shaping, to keep backaches at bay, and with a 2.5L reservoir, you’ll stay hydrated through all your adventures. On sale now for $75 (25% off).

• The CamelBak Mini M.U.L.E. 1.5L Hydration Pack helps the kids stay adventure-ready with its 1.5L hydration reservoir, compartments for essentials, and reflective strips for increased visibility. Currently only $38 (25% off).

• The K.U.D.U. Protector 20 17L Hydration Pack is designed for enduro, bike parks, and downhill. It adds built-in back and spine protection to its 17L cargo capacity and 3L hydration reservoir. Get it now for $130 (that’s almost half off)!

Clothing

Find tons of men’s and women’s PEARL iZUMi clothing for road, gravel and mountain biking for 25% off, including:

• The men’s PEARL iZUMi Attack Bike Shorts give you their ultra-comfortable chamois without the bibstraps, perfect for more casual rides or under mountain bike shorts. On sale for $60. Throw thee PEARL iZUMi Canyon Bike Shorts ($64) over them for trail rides…or just riding to the bar or coffee shop.

• Considering all the snot and sweat we wipe on our gloves, we’re thinking it’s definitely time for a replacement. The Men’s PEARL iZUMi Elite Gel Cycling Gloves ($29) and Women’s PEARL iZUMi Attack Bike Gloves ($23) are great short-finger options for the warmer months.

• Available in several colors, the PEARL iZUMi Classic Jersey ($64) has a nice bright pattern to help you stay visible on the road.

• For longer rides, the Men’s PEARL iZUMi Expedition Cycling Bib Shorts ($94) add more support, and make a great partner on gravel rides and drop bar adventures.

• PI makes some very comfortable shoes, making these deals a great time to update your kicks. The Men’s Attack Road Cycling Shoes ($120) cover the asphalt, and the Men’s X-Alp Divide Mountain Bike Shoes ($71) and Women’s X-Alp Summit Mountain Bike Shoes ($113) have high end features without the high end price tag.

• OK, so PI doesn’t do helmets, but if you need something for your commutes, the Electra Commute MIPS Bike Helmet is 40% off at just $60!

Gear & Tech

• Pumping out a lot of light with an easy-to-use mount and single button operation, the Light & Motion Urban 1000 Front Bike Light is one of our faves, and it’s now just $70 (22% off).

• Lots of Garmin goodies are on sale, way more than we’ve listed here, but some of the most popular items they make are the Edge 1030 Plus Bike Computer ($500 -17% off), which works great with the Garmin Varia RTL515 Rearview Radar Taillight ($170 – 15% off) to both track your ride and alert you to cars coming from behind. The Garmin inReach Mini ($300 – 14% off) weighs virtually nothing and keeps you in touch if you’re headed into the backcountry (or just out of cell service). And the Garmin Instinct Solar GPS Watch ($325 – 18% off) powers through longer workouts by harnessing the power of the sun!

• Back at camp, the Goal Zero Yeti Lithium 1500X Portable Power Station ($1600 – 20% off, other sizes also available) means you can leave the noisy generator at home and still power up all those devices between rides. Or just keep the party going with the…

• BioLite SolarHome 620+ Lights, Charger and Radio ($112 – 25% off). This complete kit provides tons of ambient light around your campsite, and music, too!

• Need both light and sound in a smaller package? The Outdoor Tech Buckshot Pro Ultra Speaker ($45 – 32% off) is one of our favorites because it fits in a jersey pocket, but pumps out enough high-quality sound for a small space. Even better, the built-in light can be used as a flashlight or a lantern!

Kryptonite Bike Locks

Keeping your bike safe is important no matter where you are, and now you can grab your favorite style of bike lock from Kryptonite at 25% off.

Bikes

Like most places, bikes are low on stock, but they still have a few left from last year that are a deal. Power up your road riding with this 2020 Cannondale Synapse Neo 1 Electric Bike … which doesn’t even look like an e-bike! It’s on sale for $3,800.

Or grab the more powerful 2020 Cannondale SuperSix EVO Neo 3 e-road bike for just $3,600.

For the little ones, the Co-op Cycles REV 12 Kids’ Balance Bike is on sale for $111.

Looking for even more deals? Shop the entire REI Anniversary Sale here! And stay tuned for our Mega Memorial Day Sales roundup with deals from all your favorite brands and retailers!
author: Harley Schafer
